channel.title: Posts on Raihan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Raihan's Blog

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hi there. I am Raihan, a 27 year old from Bangladesh and this is my blog. And it turns out that this is my first post in my blog. I was thinking of creating a personal website with github pages. I created one with minimal theme but didn’t like that much. Then I tried out the hacker theme and didn’t like that much either. Then I stumbled upon the minimalist theme, an amazing one by BDHU and that seemed the perfect one for me.
